definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: The twinkling of an eye go in winter, the spring.
sentences.chinese: 一霎時進去，冬天來了，春天的到來。

sentences.english: Just to enjoy the moment free at last?
sentences.chinese: 只是爲啦享用最終擺脫地那一霎時嗎？

sentences.english: That splendid smiling expression, fixes a lattice forever in that a moment.
sentences.chinese: 那絢爛地笑臉，永遠定格在那一霎時。
